name: Father 2: No Bad Ideas
description:
Welcome to "Take Your Daughter To Work (in your place)"! Go to WORK and perform DUTIES to impress your Parent's BOSS. Help Hazel make her way through countless ridiculous minigames so that she can make it to work on time, and help her parents keep their jobs! Finish tasks fast in this frenetic homage to Warioware and Earthbound.

Entry for the 2019 Competition

FATHER 2: NO BAD IDEAS 

Controls: WASD to move, F and J as our "A" and "B" buttons
